title: Bug 112458: Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switched to Master page viewer.
description: The Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switched to the Master page viewer.
OB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor does not change to reflect the Master Page properties.
EB: When switching to the Master Page viewer, the Property Editor should change to reflect the Master Page properties.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new report and insert a label.
2. Select the label. (The Property Editor shows the label's properties)
3. Switch to the Master Page viewer and observe the Property Editor; it should show the Master Page properties but instead, it still shows the label's properties.
